root.name: Tengai Makyou: Fuun Kabuki Den
root.description: OverviewTengai Makyou: Fuun Kabuki Den is a turn-based RPG, developed by RED Company. It was first released on the PC Engine CD in 1993 and saw a re-release in the Tengai Makyou Collection compilation for the PSP in 2008.The game's protagonist is Kabuki, one of the 4 original heroes of Tengai Makyou II. Unlike the previous entries in the series, the battle system does not have a first-person viewpoint, but rather a side view similar to that of the 2D Final Fantasy games. The game is also a bit more lighthearted and humorous than it's predecessors, featuring elements such as villains who sing a song before doing battle with the party.
